[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@loopback/express](./express.md) &gt; [MIDDLEWARE\_CONTEXT](./express.middleware_context.md)

## MIDDLEWARE\_CONTEXT variable

A symbol to store `MiddlewareContext` on the request object. This symbol can be referenced by name, before it is created.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
MIDDLEWARE_CONTEXT: unique symbol
```
